name: person/guide_taurus
dialog: This district is under the jurisdiction of the Taurus Great House. It is inhabited by the faithfuls - people honoring the Savior and they receive special support from Vatican. There are less people here than in the Serpentine quarter so order is maintained at high levels.
The price is moderate. Local apartments are the best choice for someone who knows how to save their sparks and want to live in a decent, peaceful place.
